message: Guys .. I need to get my website on Windows Azure .. It's an MVC application running over IIS .. with #Neo4j database .. and I need professional consultancy for getting the job done .. If someone is interested to help please contact me directly over here or in messages.

data.message:
Hello, I work for the company that wrote the. NET client for Neo4J and I happen to be at the customer it was written for as well :D.
From memory there is neo4j host that you can use as Azure worker role and it will download Java and. Neo4j and use it as needed. Do you have a specific question I can send to the guys?
I'm already using readify .net client ..  send my greetings to the nice team and big effort .. I just need some person to get the job done  for me
What abt using VMs on azure
